cgcloud__KPI_Set_KPI_Definition__c.name: cgcloud__KPI_Set_KPI_Definition__c
cgcloud__KPI_Set_KPI_Definition__c.description: Junction object between KPI Definition and KPI Definition Set.

cgcloud__KPI_Description__c.description: Description of the KPI definition that's shown when selecting the Adjustment KPI from lookup.

cgcloud__KPI_Tactic_Dependent__c.description: Field value that's updated based on KPI_Definition.Aggregation_Skipped_Dimesnions.

cgcloud__Manual_Input_Copy_Mode__c.description: Defines whether manual input is copied over to the target promotion.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the KpiSetKpiDefinition Record for related custom lists.

cgcloud__Sort_Subset_PSP__c.description: Sorts KPI subsets with the Promotion scenario.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sorts the KPI definition in the KPI set.

cgcloud__Storage_Options_Subset__c.description: Define subsets of KPIs that can be calculated in various writeback steps.

cgcloud__Unique_Editable_Measure_Id__c.description: Ensures that the editable measure codes per KPI set are unique. This means that no two editable KPIs create manual entries for the same measure code.

cgcloud__Unique_KPI_Id__c.description: Ensures that a KPI is assigned only once to a KPI set.

cgcloud__Unique_KPI_Id_for_Sort__c.description: Ensures that the KPI sort order is total (for two KPIs k1 within the set, either k1 < k2 or k2 < k1 is true; otherwise k1 = k2).

cgcloud__Unique_Storage_Options_Id__c.description: Ensures that the storage measure codes per KPI set are unique. This means that no two writeback KPIs create writebacks for the same measure code.
